data.title: Intuit Plans to Lay Off Approximately 1,800 Employees: A Bold Move Towards AI Integration
data.meta_description: Intuit, the parent company of TurboTax, has announced a major reorganization. The company plans to lay off approximately 1,800 employees, accounting for 10% of its workforce.
